question: What is the Wing Mastercard CSS
answer: Wing Mastercard CSS is a debit card issued by Wing Bank that allows direct access to your savings or current account and supports payments and withdrawals locally and internationally via Mastercard and CSS networks.

question: What are the benefits of the Wing Mastercard CSS

Numberless Card: Your privacy is guaranteed, and to preserve your card information, the card number, CVV2, and expiration date will not appear on the card.
Widely Accepted: Make cash withdrawals or payments via POS or online nationwide with CSS members and worldwide wherever Mastercard is accepted. You can cash out from Wing Agent and Master Agent nationwide.
Contactless: You do not have to swipe or insert your card - tap to pay at millions of locations worldwide.
Card Setting and Control via Wing Bank A: PIN Change, set a daily limit for cash withdrawal or purchase, block/unblock, and change linked account.
Card PIN Issuance: PIN set on Wing Bank App
Secure: The One-Time Password (OTP) makes your purchase safe and secure. Giving you peace of mind is our priority.
Notification: After every payment, you will receive a notification message confirming the transaction from your card.
Promotion: Enjoy a variety of promotions offered by the merchant outlets.

question: What are features of the Wing Mastercard CSS

Cash Withdrawal Channels: Wing Agent Agents, Wing Master Agents, Wing Bank ATMs, and Worldwide ATMs that Mastercard and CSS are accepted
Card PIN Issuance: PIN set on Wing Bank App
Card Setting and Control: PIN Change, set daily cash withdrawal/purchase Llimit, block/unblock and change linked account

question: How much is the annual fee for the Wing Mastercard CSS
answer: The annual fee of Wing Mastercard CSS is USD 6.

question: What documents are required to apply for the Wing Mastercard CSS
keyword: documents are required to apply wing mastercard css

Nationality: For Cambodian must include a National ID or valid passport
For Foreigner must include a valid Passport (Attached with valid Visa entry with 6 months)
Account Type: Having a savings account or a current account, either individually or jointly (Subject to the condition that anyone can sign)
Verification Account: Proof of savings or current account
Identification Proof: National ID or Valid Passport for both Cambodian and Foreigner

question: Can foreigner apply for Wing Mastercard CSS
answer: Both Cambodians and foreigners aged 18+ with valid identification can apply for Wing Mastercard CSS.

question: How can I apply for the Wing Mastercard CSS
answer: To apply for Wing Mastercard CSS, applicant should visiting a Wing Bank branch or contacting them via +855 23 999 989 for more information.

question: What is the minimum balance required to activate the Wing Mastercard CSS
keyword: minimum balance required activate wing mastercard css
answer: To activate the Wing Mastercard CSS, it is required to have a minimum of USD 10 to activate the card.

question: What is the daily purchase limit for the Wing Mastercard CSS
keyword: daily purchase limit wing mastercard css
answer: Daily purchase limit of Wing Mastercard CSS is up to USD 5,000 per day, with a maximum of 99 transactions per day.

question: How many cards can one person can hold for under Wing Mastercard CSS
keyword: ne person can hold wing mastercard css
answer: A customer can hold up to 5 Wing Mastercard CSS cards issued under their name.

question: What is the type of service fee of Wing Mastercard CSS
keyword: type service fee wing mastercard css

Cash Withdrawal Fee at CSS Member Bank A: Variable (charged by the respective CSS bank)
PIN Change Fee at CSS Member Bank ATMs: Variable (charged by the respective CSS bank)

question: What fees apply for using ATMs not owned by Wing Bank
keyword: fees apply for using ATMs wing mastercard css
answer: At other banks’ ATMs, the fee is 2% of the withdrawal amount (minimum USD 5). CSS member ATM fees depend on the respective bank.
